author: Veronika Kero
title: Want to win $1,000 to spend on DoorDash food delivery? Enter here.
description:
TL;DR: Put the frozen food away and enter for your chance to win $1,000 to spend on Doordash food delivery. 

One way to ensure that our favorite bars, restaurants, and diners remain standing despite the coronavirus outbreak is by ordering curbside pickup and…
